titleStmt.title: The morning-exercise, or some short notes taken out of the morning-sermons which divers reverend ministers of the gospel, in the city of London preached in Giles in the Fields, during the moneth of May 1655. / By Tho. Case, minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Robert Gibbs in Chancery-lane near Serjeants Inne.,

notesStmt.note: The final two leaves contain, in order, a blank leaf and: A caution to the reader.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "31 October"; "St:" preceeding 'Giles'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
